users can purchase the following kinds of recharge recharge card: 
 China Mobile prepaid card: the national common Shenzhouxing mobile brand recharge cards (17 bit serial number), and Guangdong, Liaoning, Jiangsu, Zhejiang,Fujian card. Newsstands and mobile special point of sale for sale. 
 China Unicom recharge card: the general Unicom recharge cards, newsstands and Unicom special sales point of sale. 
 China Telecom prepaid card: the universal telecommunication brand fee charging Value card, newsstands and telecom special sales point of sale. 
 users in the recharge, the corresponding amount will be deposited in the account of the user, and can be used for exchange purchase of various applications and services in the Gfan market, the face value of 1 yuan convertible 10Gfan coupons, and applies the Gfan Forum All commodity exchange.
